document_data.mainbody:
Lookout Grush was a goblin warrior who joined the cult of the Absolute of the Absolute in late 15 century DR.
Grush wore crudely-made plate armor affixed over simple cloth garments.
After joining the Absolutes cult, Grush was assigned to be a lookout at the Shattered Sanctum.
In the , Grush began watching over the cults torturer, a particularly malicious goblin named Spike.
